cufy.meta

Annotation Type Recipe


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Recipe
    A recipe to construct a value. Given the value() is the source value. And the converter() to convert that value. And type() is the type of that value.
    Since:
    21-Nov-2019
    Version:
    0.1.3
    Author:
    lsafer

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Where converter
      The reference to the converter to be used to construct the value.
      Type type
      The clazz of the object.
      java.lang.String value
      The source string of the value.

    • Element Detail

      • converter

        public abstract Where converter
        The reference to the converter to be used to construct the value.
        Returns:
        the reference to the converter to be used to construct the value
        Default:
        @cufy.meta.Where(cufy.convert.BaseConverter.class)

      • type

        public abstract Type type
        The clazz of the object.
        Returns:
        the clazz of the object
        Default:
        @cufy.meta.Type(java.lang.String.class)
